rules: Rule1: Either the actor performs on opening night or the actor performs at the matinee.
Rule2: Provided that the set designer designs the stage, the set designer decorates the set.
Rule3: If the set designer installs the props, then whenever the play is presented at the premiere, the production is successful.
Rule4: Under the condition that the set designer builds the scenery, the set designer installs the props.
Rule5: Either the costume designer is available for the fitting, or if the set designer designs the stage, then the set designer builds the scenery.
Rule6: Provided that the stage manager manages backstage, it is not the case that the stage manager coordinates the crew.
Rule7: Under the condition that the actor performs at the matinee, the production is successful.
Rule8: If the stage manager supervises the actors, then the stage manager coordinates the crew.
Rule9: Whenever the assistant director assists the director, the assistant director directs the rehearsal.
Rule10: Provided that the assistant director reports to the producer, the assistant director assists the director.
Rule11: If the understudy prepares the role, then it is not the case that the understudy delays the show.
Rule12: Either the understudy prepares the role or the understudy studies the lines.
Rule13: If the understudy practices the blocking, then whenever the understudy studies the lines, it is not the case that the understudy delays the show.
Rule14: The understudy practices the blocking or the understudy rehearses the scene.
Rule15: Whenever the understudy rehearses the scene, the understudy performs the part.
Rule16: If the understudy performs the part, then under the condition that the understudy studies the lines, it is not the case that the understudy delays the show.
Rule17: If the director participates in the rehearsal, then the director participates in the meeting.
Rule18: Either the set designer paints the backdrop or the set designer constructs the furniture.

Rule19: Under the condition that the set designer constructs the furniture, then if the set designer decorates the set, provided that the play is presented at the premiere, the production is successful.

Rule20: Provided that the set designer orders the materials, then if the set designer measures the stage, whenever the set designer paints the backdrop, under the condition that the set designer decorates the set, if the play is presented at the premiere, the production is successful.

Rule21: If the set designer acquires the props, then under the condition that the set designer measures the stage, provided that the set designer paints the backdrop, whenever the set designer decorates the set, if the play is presented at the premiere, the production is successful.
Rule22: Whenever the producer budgets the set, then either the set designer orders the materials or the set designer acquires the props.
Rule23: Either the producer budgets the set or the producer approves the design.
Rule24: Under the condition that the producer approves the design, the producer funds the construction.
Rule25: If the producer funds the construction, then either the set designer orders the materials or the set designer acquires the props.

Rule26: Either the producer attends the meeting, or if it is not the case that if the director participates in the rehearsal then it is not the case that the director participates in the meeting, then it is not the case that the producer attends the rehearsal.
Rule27: Whenever the technician operates the lighting, the technician operates the sound.
Rule28: If the technician operates the lighting, then it is not the case that the technician operates the sound.
Rule29: Either the technician operates the lighting or it is not the case that the producer attends the meeting.
Rule30: Provided that the play is presented at the gala, the production is successful.
Rule31: Either the play is presented at the gala or the play is presented at the premiere.
Rule32: If it is not the case that if the actor performs on opening night then the production is successful, then the director participates in the rehearsal.

Rule33: If it is not the case that either the costume designer is available for the alteration or it is not the case that the costume designer is available for the fitting, then the musical director is present at the rehearsal.

Rule34: Whenever it is not the case that either the costume designer is available for the alteration or it is not the case that the costume designer is available for the fitting, it is not the case that the musical director is present at the rehearsal.
Rule35: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the stage manager manages backstage then the stage manager supervises the actors, the assistant director reports to the producer.
Rule36: Whenever it is not the case that if the stage manager manages backstage then the stage manager supervises the actors, it is not the case that the assistant director directs the rehearsal.
Rule37: If it is not the case that if the director participates in the rehearsal then it is not the case that the director participates in the meeting, then the producer attends the rehearsal.

Rule38: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that the production is successful then it is not the case that the musical director is present at the performance, then the stage manager manages backstage.
Rule39: Whenever it is not the case that the production is successful, the musical director is present at the performance.
Rule40: If it is not the case that the production is successful, then the understudy delays the show.
facts: Fact1: The set designer designs the stage.
Fact2: The set designer measures the stage.
Fact3: It is not the case that the costume designer is available for the alteration.
